pitch.cc: Rick Porcello is taking a chance challenging Rafael Furcal in a location where he is hitting .600 for the season compared to .278 overall.
Rick Porcello has thrown 80 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 92 over the past 10 pitches.
Rick Porcello had Rafael Furcal down 0-2 but could not put him away.
